title: unclear decision making of publish on what to actually publish
body:
- (note) can't make it just rerun annex copy (may be with new options) since it seems to not get there since "nothing to publish"
- just keeps publishing the same sub-dataset (among many) over and over again for some reason
- it seems that '--since' is not quite functional since even if I specify some really old commit -- it just keeps publishing the same dataset over again
- seems to fail to detect that I am already in the dataset and complains " Modification detection (--since) without a base dataset is not supported"

here is a full protocol of the struggle:
```shell
$ datalad --version
datalad 0.4.1.dev533

(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast'
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids> to rolando
No handlers could be found for logger "git.remote"
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds3> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
3 items were published:
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds3
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds

(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast'
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
2 items were published:
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds

(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast'
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
1 item was published:
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds

(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast'
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
1 item was published:
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds

(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast' --since=
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
1 item was published:
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds


(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast' --since=7d95f4d31afaf0ec26cc010c06ed2d404706732f
[ERROR  ] Modification detection (--since) without a base dataset is not supported [publish.py:__call__:282] (InsufficientArgumentsError)
usage: datalad publish [--version] [-h] [-l LEVEL] [--pbs-runner {condor}]
                       [-d DATASET] [--to LABEL] [--since SINCE]
                       [--skip-failing] [--inherit-settings] [-r]
                       [--recursion-limit LEVELS] [--git-opts STRING]
                       [--annex-opts STRING] [--annex-copy-opts STRING]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
(dev)user@smaug /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids (master) $ datalad publish --to=rolando -r --annex-copy-opts ' --fast' --since=7d95f4d31afaf0ec26cc010c06ed2d404706732f -d .
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> to rolando 
[INFO   ] Publishing data of dataset <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds> ...
1 item was published:  
Dataset: /mnt/btrfs/dbic/inbox/bids/gitds1/gitds2/annexds

```
